n: Not Just for Brunch Fruit Salad
des: "I've used this recipe for many years varying the fruits that I include. I often add apples, bananas, and/or blueberries.  Though there are specific measurements in the recipe, there is no need to carefully measure each ingredient - just approximate the quantities of your favorite fruits to have a beautiful and delicious salad. I have frequently served this Christmas morning."
ins:
Mix grapes, strawberries, peaches, orange segments, and kiwi in a large bowl.
Whisk orange juice, orange-flavored liqueur, and sugar together in a bowl until sugar dissolves; gently stir into fruit until evenly coated. Cover bowl with plastic wrap and refrigerate up to 8 hours.
